content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position x1)

### Coal mine at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x2)

### Iron gear wheel factory
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position z1) that requires 2 iron plates to craft 1 iron gear wheel
- Inserter (position a) that puts into the assembling machine

### Iron plate factory
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position y1) that smelts iron ore into iron plates

### Assembling Machine 1 factory
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position z2) that requires 9 iron plates, 5 iron gear wheels, and 3 electronic circuits to craft

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting due to insufficient resources
- Ensure you have enough of the required resources in your inventory before attempting to craft items. For example, crafting iron gear wheels requires iron plates, which must be available.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors when trying to craft without a crafting machine
- Ensure that you are using a crafting machine or furnace when attempting to craft items that require them.
